name: Gimme Cake
description:
Description:

The little caterpillar doesn't want to eat his healthy fruits, he rather want to eat cake all day long.

Caterpillar mommy is feed up with him, so run... run little grub.

How to play:

You have to press the right button to jump and dodge obstacles. You can make a tripple jump.

Controls:

jump = W, A, S, D
